wikipedia.title: Battle of Belaćevac Mine
wikipedia.summary: The Battle of Belaćevac Mine was a week-long clash between the Yugoslav Army (VJ), Serbian police (MUP) and the Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA) in June 1998, during the Kosovo War.

wikipedia.title: Battle of Belaćevac Mine
wikipedia.summary: The Battle of Belaćevac Mine was a week-long clash between the Yugoslav Army (VJ), Serbian police (MUP) and the Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA) in June 1998, during the Kosovo War.

wikipedia.title: Battle of Junik
wikipedia.summary: The Battle of Junik was a battle fought during the Kosovo War between the ethnic Albanian paramilitary organization known as the Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA) and the security forces of the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia over the town of Junik in western Ko

wikipedia.title: December 14, 1998 Albanian–Yugoslav border ambush
wikipedia.summary: On December 14, 1998 the Yugoslav Army (VJ) ambushed a group of 140 Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA) militants attempting to smuggle weapons and supplies from their base in Albania into the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

wikipedia.title: December 14, 1998 Albanian–Yugoslav border ambush
wikipedia.summary: On December 14, 1998 the Yugoslav Army (VJ) ambushed a group of 140 Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA) militants attempting to smuggle weapons and supplies from their base in Albania into the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

wikipedia.title: July 18, 1998 Albanian–Yugoslav border clashes
wikipedia.summary: On July 18, 1998 a Yugoslav Army (VJ) border patrol ambushed over 200 Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA) insurgents and foreign mujahideen just west of Dečani, on the frontier between Albania and Yugoslavia.

wikipedia.title: Operation Storm
wikipedia.summary: Operation Storm (, Операција Олуја) was the last major battle of the Croatian War of Independence and a major factor in the outcome of the Bosnian War.
